Directions
In a large Dutch oven, combine rhubarb and water. Bring to a boil over high heat, cover, and reduce heat to simmer for 15 minutes.
Strain liquid through a fine-mesh strainer into a pitcher or spouted bowl, pressing on the solids in strainer to extract as much juice as possible.
Refrigerate until cold, at least 3 hours. If the juice separates, leaving a yellowish sludge at the bottom, decant the clear pink liquid into a clean bottle or pitcher, leaving the sludge behind. Serve cold over ice, adding sugar to taste, if desired.
Special Equipment
5-quart pot
,
fine-mesh strainer
Notes
You can line the fine-mesh strainer with cheesecloth to strain out more solids.
